channel.title: How many rights can i customly put in? and allstar scape og coords
channel.description: well i want to add in something where once you first come to my game, you are have a choice between a certain team and basically the rest of the game is based off the decision you first make. like anybody know if its possible to make more rights? like above 10? becuase i want my admins and mods to also be on these "teams " so if anyone thinks they can help me i would appreciate it. And im using Allstar scape source im wondering if anyone knows how to change the original home coordinates? i tried looking in client and using Cntrl +F and even searching for the coordinates currently set at, but the original coordinates aren't even in client.java :\

item.title: How many rights can i customly put in? and allstar scape og coords
item.dc:creator: @Wrenn Wrenn
item.description:
@Wrenn wrote:

ok i did what he told me but now how can i attach the “points” to the portals? like since now i want to have 4 different teams how can i make 1 portal this team and the 2 nd portal team 2 and portal team 3 and 4th portal team 4 lol.

Read full topic

item.title: How many rights can i customly put in? and allstar scape og coords

@11167 wrote:

Just for making it save to the character file, no, rights don’t matter.

ok thanks guys im wondering though when making the int or string does it matter whether the person is an admin or whatever? or do i have to make another string?

item.source: How many rights can i customly put in? and allstar scape og coords

item.title: How many rights can i customly put in? and allstar scape og coords
item.dc:creator: @gon3d34d123 gon3d34d123
item.description:
@gon3d34d123 wrote:

This is ‘free hand’ coded, so if any errors just fix it…

All-star how to;
add ‘points’
changed:
Client Class

Search for:

public int starter = 0;

Then add

public int points = 0;

to the bottom of that…

After that,

Search for:

(token.equals("character-starter")

it should look smilar or exactly like,

if (token.equals("character-starter")) {
starter = Integer.parseInt(token2);

Under that add

[code]

} else if (token.equals(“character-points”)) {
points = Integer.parseInt(token2); [/code]

MAKE SURE NOT TO GO OUTSIDE THE “break;”!

now, search for-


characterfile.write("character-starter = ", 0, 20);

It should look like

characterfile.write("character-starter = ", 0, 20); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(starter), 0, Integer.toString(starter).length()); characterfile.newLine();

now, the final step,

add:

characterfile.write("character-points = ", 0, 19);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(points), 0,
Integer.toString(points).length());
characterfile.newLine();

you now succesfully added “points” string to your - More info file!

This works the same whit choose “red” team.
just change it to

weither your red,

pplRed , instead of points.

or

pplBlu.

Good luck!

Linus

Read full topic

item.title: How many rights can i customly put in? and allstar scape og coords
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

What Zyle just said is what I had in mind: create an int or String to the player’s file. (like String team = “Red”; and in the character file it’d be character-team = Red, or int team = 1;)

Read full topic

item.title: How many rights can i customly put in? and allstar scape og coords
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Teams? Really? If you wanted to make teams, you could have just as easily made an int, or a String for the player, saying what they’re team is.

Read full topic

item.title: How many rights can i customly put in? and allstar scape og coords

item.description:
@Wrenn wrote:

sort of… but i was thinking more along the lines like when you start out i have different teleports that you choose from and depending on which teleport you choose your player rights are boosted to either 9 10 11 or 12 becuase there are 4 teams. and i just base the rest of the game off that.

item.title: How many rights can i customly put in? and allstar scape og coords
item.dc:creator: @fatwallet fatwallet
item.description:
@fatwallet wrote:

Well, you could probably disable teleporting, and have it so the user must pick a side, then their rights are boosted to 1, and make it so that you cant teleport ::home unless your playerrights are 1?

item.title: How many rights can i customly put in? and allstar scape og coords
item.dc:creator: @p00n99range p00n99range
item.description:
@p00n99range wrote:

Yes, it is possible to make more rights. Mainly people don’t make more because it can be complicated. I only use 1-4 rights. 1 as mod 2 as admin 3 as owner 4 as undercover. I couldn’t help you with any of the other stuff you want to do though. Sorry.

Read full topic
